files.content:
import { Plus } from "lucide-react"

import {
  Accordion,
  AccordionContent,
  AccordionItem,
  AccordionTrigger,
} from "../molecule-ui/accordion"

export function AccordionDemo() {
  return (
    <Accordion className="w-full" type="multiple">
      <AccordionItem value="item-1">
        <AccordionTrigger>What is Molecule UI</AccordionTrigger>
        <AccordionContent>
          Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellat
          autem consectetur saepe architecto, alias tenetur. Voluptatem natus
          accusamus id ea, doloribus maxime iure nostrum, eveniet reprehenderit
          reiciendis deserunt in consequuntur.
        </AccordionContent>
      </AccordionItem>
      <AccordionItem value="item-2">
        <AccordionTrigger>Hello World</AccordionTrigger>
        <AccordionContent>
          Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Magni
          sapiente et fugit eum totam aperiam recusandae tenetur, odit commodi
          quae ullam expedita cum ipsa enim minus. Ipsa adipisci illum dolorum!
        </AccordionContent>
      </AccordionItem>
    </Accordion>
  )
}
